1.content:
The Transformers. The popular series of giant alien robots of the planet, Cybertron. Despite how many forms the series took, it was always the same old thing; the Autobots, the good guys, versus the Decepticons, the bad ones, in a long and seemingly never ending war against each other.

But you are here to slightly change that into something more... 'pleasing', aren't you?

Where do you wanna begin in the Transformers series?
1.title: Beginning of the Journey

You've chosen Transformers Animated. The cartoon show where Optimus Prime is just an Autobot leader of a ragtag group that consists of a hyperactive Bumblebee, a cranky Ratchet, a gentle but quick tempered Bulkhead, and a ninja trained Prowl. Leading them against Megatron and the Decepticons on Earth.

So... how and who will you begin as?

13.content:
You've chosen Transformers Prime, the latest incarnation of the series, featuring a ragtag group of Autobots going up against the invading forces of the Decepticons, with Cybertron a rotting shell because of the war. The Autobots must find a way to hold off the Decepticons while protecting their new human allies...

Autobots: Optimus Prime (leader), Arcee (second-in-command), Bulkhead, Bumblebee, Ratchet, Smokescreen

Human allies: Special Agent William Fowler, Jack Darby, Miko Nadakai, Rafael "Raf" Esquivel, June Darby

Decepticons: Megatron, Starscream, Soundwave, Knock Out, Breakdown (deceased in the main continuity), Airachnid, Dreadwing, Shockwave (off-planet)

Mooks: Vehicons, Insecticons

Human villains: Silas (aka Colonel Leland Bishop, aka C.Y.L.A.S.)

Anyway, where do you want to start?
13.title: Transformers Prime

131.content: More than meets the eye. But who do you want to start with from our heroes?

http://tfwiki.net/w2/images2/thumb/6/6f/Arceeandherblaster.jpg/711px-Arceeandher...

Arcee, second-in-command and the fast attack specialist of the Autobots. Brave and courageous, she transforms into a motorcycle. She is very serious in battle, and protective of her human partner, Jack Darby.

This is because her past two partners met tragic ends, the first murdered by the sadistic Airachnid, the second killed by Starscream and turned into a zombie by Megatron, and then destroyed again.

But even she is not without affection, as she is a passionate woman.

How will that passion express itself?

Story 1: Arcee and Jack realize that they've fallen in love, and ask Ratchet about ways of managing 'compatibility' between the two of them.

Story 2: Arcee is given 'upgrades' by Knock Out that make her a submissive sex toy towards humans. Ratchet manages to limit the effect to their human companies, but with the exception of Raf, the others can't resist taking advantage of her.

Story 3: The Autobots are defeated. Arcee is captured by the Decepticons, and sold as a slave, taken in by masters with a robot fetish.

14.content:
You have chosen Generation One as your setting. The television series that aired in the 80's and started the Transformers franchise. After millions of years battling for the fate of their home the Autobots and Decepticons arrived on Earth in search of a new energy source to restore their dark home world of Cybertron. Now the Autobots must find a way to save their home and protect the Earth from the Decepticon threat.

The Autobots: Led by Optimus Prime, the Autobots are sworn to protect all life and the freedoms they deserve. They vow to end the Decepticon threat once and for all no matter the cost.

The Decepticons: Led by Megatron, the Decepticons care little for those outside themselves. They plan to conquer Earth, harvesting its resources and enslaving the planet's populace, in order to revive Cybertron.

Female Autobots: A small band of Autobot warriors assumed dead who remain behind on Cybertron while fighting off Shockwave and his armies from seizing control of the planet.

The Quintessons: The creators of the Transformer race who fled Cybertron after their creations rebelled against them. They intend to reclaim their home and enslave both the Autobots and Decepticons in any way they see fit.

Humans: A native to the planet Earth who the Autobots have sworn to protect against the Decepticons who items on enslaving them. Not all humans are good but nor are they all bad either.
14.title: Transformers G1

info.brief_description: No one has started a rated 18+ Transformers interactive story here. I decided to make one.
info.description:
Alright people! This is a Transformers interactive story if you couldn't tell. Here is the point of this story. Mechs and femmes, Autobots and Decepticons and other Cybertronians alike are getting horny and kinky and it's up to you how they relieve themselves.

Here are the rules for this story:

1) There can be sex in any form between any transformers such as mech/mech, mech/femme, femme/femme or/and orgies or something. But there can not be any sexual relationship between a transformer and a human/organic at all.

2) Transformations can only happen to humans, who can only transform/change into a transformer.

3) No vore of any kind, no character deaths, no bad spelling grammar and punctuation, no just one sentence chapters, and no endings please.

4) You can create your own character or use any characters of the TF series.

5) Don't be afraid of using many kinks in transformers. For examples of said kinks for you to use for transformers can be found here: http://tfanonkink.livejournal.com/11556.html
